findings.title: _tokenTransfer() emits s.marketing fee on capital block
findings.description: The tokenTransfer function emits a marketing fee on the capital block.

findings.title: Incorrect Data Type Usage
findings.description: IRouter uses UInt instead of UInt256, which can lead to potential precision loss or overflow issues.

findings.title: _transfer() function uses UInt instead of UInt256
findings.description: The _transfer() function in the swap block uses UInt instead of UInt256, which may lead to precision loss or unexpected behavior.

findings.title: Incorrect Data Type Usage in rescueAnyERC20Tokens()
findings.description: The rescueAnyERC20Tokens() function uses UInt instead of UInt256, which may lead to precision loss or unexpected behavior.

findings.title: Owner privileges (In the period when the owner is not renounced)
findings.description: The contract owner has excessive privileges to modify critical settings and perform sensitive actions without proper access control.
